duties_responsibilities.duty: Running a daily route to resolve customer pest concerns and issues
Maintaining truck and equipment in proper working order
Keeping accurate records of treatments provided
Mixing, applying, and working with pesticides following state and federal laws
Serving as the subject matter expert for customers by implementing the most efficient and overall best pest solution for individual needs
Maintaining and servicing all route customers according to company standards and procedures
Keeping management informed of any problems encountered on service routes
Maintaining proper inventory of pesticides in usage

education_certification.credential: US driver’s license that has been valid for a minimum of 4 years
